Feb. 25, 1967 D Yorkshire Brass Band Championship (Second Section)
Yorkshire Brass Band Championship (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Brass Band Championship yorkshire-brass-band-championship-second-section
None Yorkshire
Second
A Moorside Suite
St. George's Hall, Bradford, West Yorkshire, England, UK Organised by Yorkshire BBA in protest to National Brass Band Council stating which test pieces should be used in all area contests. Qualifying contest held on 26th March at Leeds Town Hall.
